sentences.text: I want to try on this funny hat.
She put on her shoes and danced.
He took off his socks and ran to the pool.
I love to shop online in my pajamas.
I returned the boots because they sang at night.
I got a refund and bought ice cream.
My pizza delivery came with a smiley face.
At checkout, I found a free cookie.
My shopping cart ran away in the wind.
I put a watermelon in my shopping basket.
I got a discount for dancing in the store.
The store had a sale on rubber ducks.
This T-shirt is the size of my dog.
These pants don’t fit, but they’re funny.
I lost the receipt in my sandwich.
In the changing room, I met a squirrel.
The fitting room mirror told me a joke.
Let’s go shopping for rainbow socks.
